timeline.bodyText: I think this has been removed now with @mitchdenny's recent work.
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -98,9 +98,14 @@ stages:
                 deploy:
                   steps:
                     - checkout: self
+                    - template: /eng/pipelines/templates/steps/stage-artifacts.yml

timeline.message: reflect latest master. stage-artifacts is gone
uncomment dependency now that release has executed successfully

timeline.bodyText: This CIConfig is a little hard to read/parse inline in the yml. Do we have any better options to pass this data? Perhaps we could also put it as a config file that we read.
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -152,14 +152,19 @@ stages:
               environment: github
               dependsOn: PublishPackage
               variables:
-                - template: ../variables/globals.yml
+                CIConfigs: "{'targets':[{'path_to_config':'package.json','mode':'Preview','monikerid':'1'},{'path_to_config':'package.json','mode':'Latest','monikerid':'0'}]}"

replies.bodyText: Yeah. I'll shift it to a config file location in the repo in another PR.
replies.author: scbedd
